name: Exploration of Glitch Art by Chain Virus

metadata.name: Dreams We Chose Together
metadata.description:
First piece in "Exploration Of Glitch Art By Chain Virus" collection.

Experience the chaos of glitch art by holding this art token. As a holder of this piece, you'll have the opportunity to burn it for one of three new glitch pieces (jpgs or gif), ensuring the variety of glitch pieces and edition sizes in the collection.

Burn event starts soon after open edition ends.
